name: Rebel Racing: Smasher Of Racing Legends
name_original: Rebel Racing: Smasher Of Racing Legends
description:
Are you ready for the ultimate racing experience for iOS?

Rebel Racing is a MUST-HAVE for any Race enthusiasts! Join the revolution and start Racing TODAY!

Rebel Racing is a heart-pounding, visually astounding 3D racer that puts the control directly in your hands.

Rebel Racing combines stunning, high-fidelity graphics with addictive gameplay and In Rebel Racing, being daring and passing Avoid traffic, to help you through your chase and your score.

And when you’re ready, it’s time to challenge the players that rule the game.

Key features:
- Console quality 3D graphics
- Play Offline.
- Real 3D environment and Trucks!
- Real physics.
- Fast paced, intense gameplay.
